data.title: I Want Candy Lyrics by Absolute Kidz

Paragraph Lyric

(Aaron:)

I can't come out tonight

No, no her name is Candy

I want Candy

You're my girl, what the doctor ordered

So sweet, you make my mouth water

I want Candy
